body.name: Crucial Pro RAM 32GB Kit (2x16GB) DDR4 3200MT/s (or 3000MT/s or 2666MT/s) Desktop Memory CP2K16G4DFRA32A
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 28 mins
features: Plug-and-play high performance. Downclock capable for systems that only support 3000MT/s or 2666MT/s
Universal compatibility. Compatible with 8th–13th Gen Intel Core or AMD Ryzen 1000–5000 Series desktop CPUs
Supports Intel XMP 2.0 to recover memory speed if the CPU suppresses it in 4 DIMM configurations
Game at higher frame rates, multitask better, enhance productivity, save time and money
ECC type = non-ECC, form factor = UDIMM, pin count = 288-pin, PC speed = PC5-25600, voltage = 1.2V, rank and configuration = 2Rx8 or 1Rx8
body.description: CP2K16G4DFRA32A is the Crucial DDR4 Pro 32GB kit consisting of two 16GB desktop modules that operate at the speed of 3200MMT/s and has a CAS Latency of 22. It is an UDIMM and conforms to the industry standard DDR4 UDIMM layout of 288 pins. It is compatible with systems that can take DDR4-3200 UDIMM memory.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 2,198 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Micron quality and reliability As one of only three global memory manufacturers, and with 45 years of memory expertise, Micron delivers cutting-edge engineering and superior component and module-level testing for all Crucial DRAM products. Crucial DDR4 Pro Memory modules (UDIMMs) can only be installed in desktops/workstations built to support DDR4 DRAM, such as 8th–13th Gen Intel Core and AMD Ryzen 1000–5000 Series desktop CPUs.Crucial DDR4 Pro Memory modules can reach rated JEDEC speeds with Intel XMP 2.0 turned on in the UEFI/BIOS settings. Altering clock frequency or voltage may result in damage to computer components. Micron disclaims any and all liability for such damage. Voided if Crucial DRAM is set to overclock beyond JEDEC specifications, rated speeds, and timings.Comparing 3,200MT/s to 2,400MT/s.Densities are defined by JEDEC for the life of the DDR4 generation of memory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, good support
reviews.reviewText: I got a 32GB RAM kit for my PC, and it's been awesome – no issues at all, and my computer runs really well now.When I got the package, though, the box was wet. I wasn't sure why. I contacted customer support, and they gave me back some money, maybe 20% or 30% (I don't remember exactly).Despite the wet box, the RAM inside was perfectly fine. It's made a big difference in how well my computer works. If you want good RAM with helpful customer support, this 32GB kit is a good choice. I'd give it 5 stars for how well it works and 4 stars for the wet box thing. Overall, I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Name Brand at a Budget price
reviews.reviewText: The added heat sinks are a nice touch and look fantastic. These were easy to install and work perfectly. Well trusted name brand quality at a very reasonable price. Why overspend... This is what you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A+ Its crucial that you use Cruical ram. Trusted brand and great performance.
reviews.reviewText: A+ Its crucial that you use Cruical ram. Trusted brand and great performance. Installed on Dell pc. Running like a champ on a business machine. So fast and quick on programs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Upgrade on my HP ENVY desktop computer (not used for gaming)
reviews.reviewText: Built-in heat spreader and a sale price = Irresistible to me.They work like a charm, and now I have more "breathing room" for my multiple open Windows . . .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought this to replace crappy Silicon Power RAM
reviews.reviewText: When I originally built my PC, I was running on a tight budget and had to cheap out on some Silicon Power RAM. I ended up regretting this because my computer routinely crashed. This was a very annoying issue. After running some diagnostic tests, I discovered that my Silicon Power RAM had failed and was causing frequent crashes. This was after only a couple months of use.I ended up purchasing this Crucial RAM to replace it. Ever since the moment I installed this RAM, my computer has not crashed once. This RAM fixed all my problems and now my computer runs smooth and fast. I highly recommend this. I've been using it in my gaming PC now for a few months without issues. It is not RGB but I didn't want that.Do yourself a favor and don't cheap out on RAM like I did. This RAM is a good purchase and should last a long time. Crucial also has a good warranty unlike Silicon Power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install, no problems
reviews.reviewText: How much could I possibly say about RAM???? Overall, it was easy to install and worked immediately. Shot my FPS up as I was at 16 GB before. I recommend to anyone who is currently at 16 to either look into this product (or if you have more, just get 16).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buy it for 45$, pretty bad timings (22-22-22), but overall OK. Good purchase.
reviews.reviewText: I want to preface this review by saying:1. My computer would initially NOT BOOT AT ALL WHEN THESE STICKS WERE INSTALLED. But, once the computer restarted itself several times (like 3-4), a bios notification appeared, notifying me I might have incompatible settings, and to try the default settings. After confirming, the computer booted up fine(Note: I still have XMP enabled).2. I ran several tests on my sticks (with MT86+ and OCCT), and found no write/read errors at all. Several people reported they received bad sticks, so make sure you extensively test your sticks before your return date runs out!!Now,I bought mine for around 45$ (not including shipping), which is an EXCELLENT price for 32 gigs, even though the 22-22-22 timings are pretty bad. Having more memory is much better than having better timings.I did not run any benchmarks to see how "worse off" my output is with these new sticks, but I don't seem to have lost any frames while playing games, for an instance. Overall, I am pretty happy with the sticks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded from 32GB to 128 to this brand. the other RAM I was using I got ripped off because it said it was 3200MHZ but it was actually running at 2100MHZ. When I installed this one it actually runs at what it says, 3200MHZ. This RAM is kind of pricey but it is supposed to be very high quality and professional. It should last a long time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Une expérience exceptionnelle avec la RAM Corsair 64 Go
reviews.reviewText: J'ai récemment acquis la RAM Corsair 64 Go via Amazon et je suis extrêmement satisfait de cette acquisition. Après un mois d'utilisation intensive, je peux affirmer avec confiance que cette mémoire vive excelle à tous égards, offrant une performance exceptionnelle et un excellent rapport qualité-prix.L'une des premières impressions que j'ai eues en déballant la RAM était la qualité de fabrication évidente. Les barrettes sont solides, bien construites, et le design est sobre mais élégant. Corsair est connu pour sa fiabilité, et cette RAM ne fait pas exception.Sur le plan des performances, la RAM Corsair 64 Go a surpassé mes attentes. Les applications se chargent rapidement, les jeux fonctionnent en douceur, et la gestion multitâche est un jeu d'enfant. Avec une capacité de 64 Go, cette RAM est idéale pour les utilisateurs gourmands en ressources, que ce soit pour la production multimédia, le montage vidéo, ou le jeu intensif.La stabilité est un autre point fort de cette RAM. Après un mois d'utilisation continue, je n'ai rencontré aucun problème de performance ou de stabilité. Aucun signe d'usure n'est apparent, ce qui témoigne de la qualité des composants utilisés par Corsair.Un aspect important à souligner est le prix abordable de cette RAM par rapport à d'autres options sur le marché. Corsair a réussi à proposer un produit de haute qualité sans sacrifier la compétitivité sur le plan financier. Cela en fait un choix judicieux pour ceux qui recherchent une mise à niveau significative de la mémoire sans vider leur portefeuille.En conclusion, la RAM Corsair 64 Go est un investissement judicieux pour ceux qui cherchent à améliorer les performances de leur système. Avec une construction solide, des performances exceptionnelles et un prix abordable, cette RAM a largement dépassé mes attentes. Je recommande vivement ce produit à tous ceux qui recherchent une solution fiable et performante pour leurs besoins en mémoire vive.
Las memorias llegaron en su empaque original y en excelentes condiciones

Easy to install, no issues, no defects, well made RAM. After I installed the RAM I ran some tests and there was no issues or problems. I've been testing it and so far so good. As expected from Crucial.

More capacity is always better for heavy tasks but so far I do not think it did any near 25% performance increase nor does it make it faster for any thing I tested. But it feels better in a smooth way instead of things being opened and you having to wait forever. This makes it feel less like that, maybe because more RAM the more usage can be met.My hopes is this product remains the same price and then I can buy a another pair and have 64GBs which is all I ever need.Thanks for making this product in high quality!

This ram has a cas latency of 22 which is generally going to be quite terrible for gaming.Ignore this kit and pay a bit more for a CL16 kit elsewhere instead. Very disappointing of crucial that this is information is not being clearly shown in the product name.
